mapper.select:
SELECT u.id as id, account, name, mobile, sex FROM pd_auth_user u INNER JOIN pd_auth_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id where ur.role_id = #{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
and (u.account like #{keyword, typeHandler=fullLike} or u.`name` like #{keyword, typeHandler=fullLike})
mapper.update: update pd_auth_user set password_error_num = password_error_num + 1, password_error_last_time = SYSDATE() where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
update pd_auth_user set password_error_num = 0, password_error_last_time = SYSDATE() where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
update pd_auth_user set last_login_time = #{now, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where account = #{account, jdbcType=BIGINT}
